cards.title: Wings of Change
cards.text: When was the last time a trip truly changed the way you see yourself?

cards.title: If These Bars Could Talk
cards.text: What unforgettable conversation did you have while traveling?

cards.title: Layovers & Lessons
cards.text: A delay that taught you patience or perspective—what happened?

cards.title: Cultural Compass
cards.text: What culture surprised you in the most beautiful way—and why?

cards.title: The Moment You Arrived
cards.text: Recall a moment you landed and thought: 'I’m meant to be here.'

cards.title: Time Zones & Timelines
cards.text: If you could relive one travel day exactly—what day is it?

cards.title: Lost & Found
cards.text: Something meaningful you lost—and something unexpected you found.

cards.title: Languages of Connection
cards.text: A kind gesture a stranger showed you abroad—tell the story.

cards.title: Passport to Peace
cards.text: A place that instantly calmed your spirit—what made it peaceful?

cards.title: Your Next Adventure Awaits
cards.text: If your next trip were a life chapter, what’s the title?

cards.title: The Taste of Travel
cards.text: A food or drink that instantly transports you—where does it take you?

cards.title: Postcards to the Past
cards.text: Write a one-line postcard to your younger self from the road.

cards.title: Unexpected Magic
cards.text: A small travel moment that felt like magic—what happened?

cards.title: Between Departures
cards.text: What do you think about when waiting at the gate to board?

cards.title: The Things We Carry
cards.text: One item you never travel without—and why it matters.

cards.title: Nature’s Remedy
cards.text: The most breathtaking natural wonder you’ve seen—what did it teach you?

cards.title: Mirror Miles
cards.text: Do you travel to escape or to discover? What have you learned?

cards.title: Soundtrack of a Journey
cards.text: One song that defines a trip or era—and why that song?

cards.title: Midnight Memories
cards.text: A night on the road you’ll never forget—paint the scene.

cards.title: Flight Paths & Fate
cards.text: Do trips happen for a reason—or do we create the meaning?

cards.title: The Legend Within the Journey
cards.text: Fifty years from now, what lesson should your travels teach?
